alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Butts; Jasper; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Morgan; Newton; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 9:24AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bibb, south central Morgan, western Putnam, Monroe, Butts, western Jones, Jasper, south central Newton and eastern Lamar Counties through 1000 AM EST ... At 923 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Turtle Cove to near Russellville, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Jackson, Forsyth, Monticello, Flovilla, Shady Dale, Payne, Culloden, Payne City, Stewart, Turtle Cove, Wayside, Worthville, Round Oak, Russellville, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, Wesleyan, Blount, Eudora, and Arkwright. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Butts; Jasper; Jones; Lamar; Monroe; Morgan; Newton; Putnam
